value.0:
DESCRIPTION:
agate comes in a varety of looks and forms. 
LORE:
Agates are belived to be a strong healing stone. The fire agate is said to draw fever out from a body and even help restor lost hope.
Sages belive Fire agate forms in thin rocky layers that refract the incoming light, giving the gem its "fire." The refraction often forms patterns reminiscent of a dragon's scales, which makes it prized by sorcerers who claim to trace their lineage back to dragonkin. A well-cut stone has its outer layers polished and ground away until only the fire is visible.
